hero.name: Gonzalo Lobos
hero.title: Business Strategy, E-commerce & Web Development.
hero.subtitle: I turn strategies into digital experiences that drive growth.

about.title: About Me
about.imageAlt: Portrait of Gonzalo Lobos, E-commerce and Web Development Specialist
about.introduction: I am a professional who is passionate about connecting business and technology. Applying my experience leading e-commerce initiatives for global brands, I focus on creating memorable user experiences that drive conversion and foster loyalty.
about.skills: I turn insights into action. I use Google Analytics 4, Search Console, and BrightEdge to optimize the sales funnel. My experience in front-end development (React, Tailwind CSS) allows me to prototype and collaborate effectively with technical teams, ensuring precise execution.
about.callToAction: I'm looking to connect with innovative teams to create exceptional digital products. If my profile resonates with you, let's talk.

items.title: Expansis - Digital Solutions
items.description: Development and consulting of custom digital solutions to boost online businesses, covering web development, digital marketing, and SEO strategies.

items.title: Lobos Mini Excavators
items.description: Website for a mini excavator rental company, focused on excavations and earthmoving in confined spaces in the Aconcagua Valley.

items.title: My Personal Portfolio
items.description: Design and development of my own professional portfolio website. Built from scratch with React and Tailwind CSS, and deployed with Firebase.

caseStudies.title: Case Studies
caseStudies.subtitle: A selection of my most recent achievements and projects.

items.title: Digital Campaign Management
items.problem: Need to execute multiple simultaneous campaigns on web and app to boost sales.
items.objective: Orchestrate over 30 annual campaigns, ensuring a consistent user experience.
actions: Planning and execution of the annual campaign calendar.
Coordination with design, development, and marketing teams.
results: Successful execution of campaigns, resulting in high annual sales volume.
Improvement in purchase frequency and interaction.

items.title: SEO Order Growth
items.problem: Identified a growth opportunity in the organic channel, which had an order share below the brand's potential.
items.objective: Increase visibility and sales share from the organic channel through a content and technical optimization strategy.
actions: Implementation of FAQ sections on product pages.
Use of structured data (Schema) for visibility.
results: Double-digit growth in sales from the organic channel.
Significant increase in the channel's order share within the sales mix.

items.title: Pickup Channel Optimization
items.problem: The "Boutique Pickup" service was inconsistent, not available in all stores, and generated confusion.
items.objective: Implement and standardize the "Boutique Pickup" service in 100% of stores to unify the experience.
actions: Service rollout to all boutiques nationwide.
Training of in-store teams on the new operational flow.
Optimization of communication channels for order monitoring.
Drafting and improvement of notification emails to ensure pickup.
results: Notable increase in the adoption of the pickup modality.

items.title: SEM Campaign Launch and Management
items.problem: Launch the Google Ads presence for a client (Expansis Pro) to generate qualified traffic and initial conversions.
items.objective: Implement an SEM strategy from scratch, set up conversion tracking, and obtain initial results.
actions: Structuring of the account and ad groups in Google Ads.
results: The client's first conversion events were obtained.
Successful validation of the performance funnel.

responsibilities: Lead the e-commerce strategy for Nespresso.com.
Implement UX/UI improvements.
Monitor the purchase process on Nespresso.cl.
Develop online campaigns like Cyber Day and Black Friday.
Track KPIs through Google Analytics.
Improve the SEO positioning of the website.

past.title: Training Development Manager
responsibilities: Coordination of training in the health and education sectors.
Income and expense management.
Coordination of payments with institutions.
Managed event invitations through email marketing campaigns using Mailchimp.

past.title: Front-End Developer
responsibilities: Developed websites and landing pages for various clients.
Translated client requirements into functional mockups and wireframes.

past.title: Photography Technician
responsibilities: Assisted in digital production (photo and audiovisual) for major brands.
Coordinated teams and casting for projects.

past.title: Marketing Product Management
responsibilities: Managed subscription campaigns for La Tercera newspaper.
Coordinated design and layout teams for graphic materials.
Tracked budgets and managed supplier contracts.

items.title: Master's Degree, Organizational Psychology
responsibilities: Focused on the intersection of human behavior and business strategy.

items.title: Business Administration
responsibilities: Comprehensive training in management, finance, and marketing strategy.
Specialization in business administration and development.

items.title: Technician, Advertising Photography
responsibilities: Technical training in composition, lighting, and digital post-production (Photoshop, Lightroom).

skills.title: Toolbox
skills.strategyDesc: My vision for impacting business goals.
skills.technicalDesc: Languages I use to build and prototype.

strategy.title: E-commerce Strategy
strategy.description: Roadmap definition, P&L management, and leadership of high-impact campaigns (Cyber Day, Black Friday).

strategy.title: Conversion Rate Optimization (CRO)
strategy.description: Sales funnel analysis, A/B testing (Optimizely), and continuous improvement of user experience (UX/UI).

strategy.title: Digital Marketing & SEO
strategy.description: Organic positioning strategies, SEM, and marketing automation for customer loyalty (CRM).

strategy.title: Digital Project Management
strategy.description: Coordination of multidisciplinary teams for the execution of technological and commercial projects.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: If you are interested in collaborating or have any questions, feel free to contact me. I am always interested in hearing about new and compelling challenges.
